thread.title: Where Have You Seen Academy Award Nominee Ruth Negga Before?
thread.title_full: Where Have You Seen Academy Award Nominee Ruth Negga Before?

author: Jasmine Grant
title: Where Have You Seen Academy Award Nominee Ruth Negga Before?
text:
Where Have You Seen Academy Award Nominee Ruth Negga Before? Here are five standout roles, from Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. to The Preacher. by Jasmine Grant 2/26/2017 
Ruth Negga is one of the new kids on the block at this year’s Academy Awards. Her demure yet transcendent portrayal of Mildred in the Oscar-nominated film Loving has made her a “one to watch” in this year’s crop of nominees. Yes, she is poised to take on Hollywood full force. However, this isn’t the Irish beauty’s first time at the rodeo. Run, don’t walk, to see her fantastic performances in these 5 other projects. 
Stay tuned for the Oscars tonight to see if Ruth will take the win for Best Actress. 
What do the Illuminati, Marisa Tomei, and Daniel Day-Lewis all have in common? Crazy conspiracy theories that all revolve around the Academy Awards.
